        public static <T> T findObject(java.lang.Object fieldContainer,
                               java.lang.String... fieldNames)
        Finds an object by the specified name(s) in the specified object, and returns it
        Type Parameters:
        T - The data type of the object to return
        Parameters:
        fieldContainer - The object to find the object in
        fieldNames - A list of all possible names for the object
        Returns:
        An object of the specified type with the first possible of the passed names
